lines.text: Work equation when force is at an angle

secText:
Lesson:
1. Calculate the [OBJ:expsec_f957:work] done on an object when the force and displacement are not parallel.
2. Work through a sample problem to [OBJ:app_inclined_plane_saves_work_question:calculate the work] done on an object being pushed up a slope.
3. Prove that work can be [OBJ:expsec_f958:negative].
4. Determine how to calculate the amount of [OBJ:expsec_f960:work done on an object] when the force on the object changes.
Quick Review: [OBJ:sum_work_angle:Work: Force at Angle to Displacement]
